title: Improved Actions using The Renormalization Group
authors: Guy Segall, Snir Gazit, Daniel Podolsky
abstract:
We introduce a numerical method to study critical properties near classical
and quantum phase transitions. Our method applies ideas of the Tensor
Renormalization Group to obtain an improved action which is used to extract
critical properties by performing Monte Carlo simulations on relatively small
system sizes. We demonstrate this method on the XY model in three dimensions.
Our method may provide a framework with which to efficiently study universal
properties in a large class of phase transitions.
